member.name: IDXGISurface.GetDesc
member.summary: Get a description of the surface.
member.param: A pointer to the surface description (see ).
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise, returns one of the error codes that are described in the DXGI_ERROR topic.

member.name: IDXGISurface.Map
member.summary: Get a pointer to the data contained in the surface, and deny GPU access to the surface.
member.param: A pointer to the surface data (see ).

param.name: MapFlags
param.para: CPU read-write flags. These flags can be combined with a logical OR.

item.description: DXGI_MAP_DISCARD - Discard the previous contents of a resource when it is mapped.

member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise, returns one of the error codes that are described in the DXGI_ERROR topic.

member.name: IDXGISurface.Unmap
member.summary: Invalidate the pointer to the surface retrieved by and re-enable GPU access to the resource.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise, returns one of the error codes that are described in the DXGI_ERROR topic.

member.name: IDXGISurface
member.summary: The IDXGISurface interface implements methods for image-data objects.
